title: Star Wars
details: Angsty kid plays with an old man, a machine, and a princess to try and get in touch with his spiritual side

title: Back to the Future
details: Angsty kid plays with an old man to go back in time to right history while avoiding sleeping with his mother.

title: The Matrix
details: Angsty guy gets fed up with an office job, takes some drugs that melt his brain, and imagines himeself practicing kung-fu.

title: Inception
details: No one really knows what this is all about. Layers. I guess...

title: Interstellar
details: Angsty man attempts so save the human race while getting creeped out by a ghostly thing that is actually himself.
